original_text: And Moses and Eleazar the priest received the gold from the commanders of thousands and of hundreds, and brought it into the tent of meeting, as a memorial for the people of Israel before the Lord.
korean_text: 모세와 제사장 엘르아살이 천부장과 백부장들에게서 금을 취하여 회막에 드려 여호와 앞에서 이스라엘 자손의 기념을 삼았더라

sentences.original_text: And Moses and Eleazar the priest
from the commanders of thousands and of hundreds
and brought it into the tent of meeting
as a memorial for the people of Israel
